cause.description:
How many times a day do I have to click no I don't want to become a silly zombie or no I don't want to join your mob wars!!! I mean seriously this application pyramid scheme of ranked based on friends joining thing is getting a tad out of hand...
1. Stop people from biting me
2. Stop people from biting my friends
3. Find a cure for annoying chain apps like zombies!
cause.mission: Eliminate the application from Facebook that keeps biting us!!!
cause.name: Stop the zombies, pirates, Jedi, mobwars, and every other spam application from facebook
